about_the_game:
Madzik is a vibrant tribute to the electrifying '80s, immersing you in a nostalgic realm where every beat of music and pixel radiates the era’s spirit. In this fantasy hack and slash adventure, the power of multiple moons reshapes both the environment and foes, introducing new challenges at every twist and turn.

Are you ready to harness these celestial forces and carve out your destiny? Swipe left for a brutal tank, or right for a feisty yet powerful spellcaster.




  • Seamless Hero Switching: Instantly toggle between Makino or Veroline. Both gifted fighters, one can dish out damage as much as he takes, while the other can neutralize and annihilate groups in an instant.
  • Co-op Gameplay: Team up via Steam Remote Play Together, combining efforts in real-time.
  • Moon Eclipses: Experience dynamic transformations in the environment and enemies with each lunar cycle, encountering Sun, Ice, Fire, and Tempest moons.
  • Empowering Transformation: Harness Madzik energy to evolve into a powerful version of your hero, gaining new strengths and abilities.
  • Elaborate Boss Fight: Challenge the trickster Godkin, Fhum, in a complex multiphase battle that tests your strategy, skills, and endurance.
  • Versatile Ability System: Engage with a flexible ability system that offers a variety of skills to customize your playstyle.

Play Madzik your way, with full Xbox/PlayStation controllers support, as well as keyword and mouse.






For centuries, Zikverländ flourished under the watchful eye of Zik, the Sun God. However, the ambitious Turncoat Mage, Ahnglum, unleashed chaos by opening ancient portals, releasing alien moons and monstrous creatures. This brought the Nightfalls - a terrifying plague that causes madness and mutations during unpredictable eclipses.

Heroes are now summoned to stop the Nightfalls, overthrow Ahnglum, and vanquish the demon God he serves. Embark on an epic quest to reclaim peace and sanity in the once serene Zikverländ. Champions, rise and put an end to the darkness!








Meet Makino, the Winged Bear: a furry powerhouse in melee combat, capable of charging into the heart of enemy ranks with his enchanted warhammer. Able to withstand lots of punishment, he can also bring the pain when needed. When Makino consumes Madzik energy, he reverts to his animal instincts, leaping at enemies to maul them with his razor-sharp claws.




Deceptively adorable Veroline is a powerful spellcaster ready to devastate anyone in her way. She uses her magical abilities to control the battlefield and escape her attackers and when empowered by Madzik, she embraces her darker side and gains a whole new suite of abilities to strike fear into her enemy's hearts.

Switch between these mighty heroes and conquer any challenges thrown at you.






Set foot in lively handcrafted lands, filled with rewarding exploration opportunities. From wool to pencil, Zikverländ is shaped with IRL elements that bring a unique aspect to our game.

Madzik is an unforgettable adventure, where moon madness, cooperative play, and immersive story-telling fuse into a one-of-a-kind retro experience.






With the financial participation of the Canada Media Fund

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10-64bit

  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 630 / Radeon HD 6570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

short_description: Smash Your Path to Destiny! Embark on a narrative-driven hack and slash adventure infused with a nostalgic '80s vibe. In the ever-shifting world of Zikverländ, every creature undergoes formidable transformations, providing a thrilling and dynamic challenge through perilous moons.
